H0.text: In Milton's 'Paradise Lost' what is the name of the Capital of Hell. Infernox

H1.text: In Milton's 'Paradise Lost' what is the name of the Capital of Hell. Abaddon

H2.text: In Milton's 'Paradise Lost' what is the name of the Capital of Hell. Dis

H3.text: In Milton's 'Paradise Lost' what is the name of the Capital of Hell. Pandæmonium

A4.text: Pandemonium is a city erected in Hell under the leadership of Mammon

A5.text: Pandæmonium (Paradise Lost), capital of Hell in John Milton's epic poem Paradise Lost
